content: i wanted a simple hat for my newborn that would keep her head warm in our cold wisconsin winters and also have the flexibility to grow with her as she gets older nothing provides this kind of warmth and size flexibility like a good 2x2 ribbing so this simple hat was born with elevated details like a tubular cast-on and mirrored crown decreases this simple child s hat is a quick knit that will keep the head of the little one in your life warm and grow with them **sizes** newborn toddler 1-3 years child 3-5 years **finished measurements** height un-stretched - 7 8 9 in 18 20 22 cm circumference un-stretched - 10 13 15 5 in 25 33 39 cm **gauge** 34 sts x 30 row = 4in 10cm in 2x2 ribbing knit in the round un-stretched **yarn** sample uses autumn and indigo fibers - classic sock held double 436 yds 398m 100g 1 skein - colorway coastal to substitute use fingering weight held double - 170yds 155m or dk weight - 90yds 82m **needles** us 2 5 3 0mm 16in 40cm circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge **notions** stitch marker tapestry needle for questions or pattern support email refractedlightknits@gmail com copyright february 2023 all rights reserved
